suite.name: activatePriority

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=cvm_v2, user=qa, passwd=DWkg8yNJjZMYFwgd, host=34.68.209.108, port=3306, charset=None)

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: Verify Activate & Edit Stamp type (6 months) is successfully

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.arg: Delete from shopick_v2.loyalty_master_priority where priority_merchant_id IN (SELECT merchant_id FROM shopick_v2.master_merchant WHERE merchant_id='${merchantId}');
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | Delete from shopick_v2.loyalty_master_priority where priority_merchant_id IN (SELECT merchant_id FROM shopick_v2.master_merchant WHERE merchant_id='ea998a56-dcf1-11eb-bce9-42010a715007');

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
